title: The SAPPHIRE Chronicles
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:saphir]]

[[include component:preview text=Where the SAPPHIRE Chronicles are brought together.]]
[[=]]

[[=image ChroniquesSAP.png]]
[[div style="font-family: Courier New, Courier, monospace; padding: 10px 30px; text-shadow: 1px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.25)"]]
**You shouldn't be snooping around here, and you know it.**

We could mistake you for **a spy**.

A mole for **the Coalition**, **the Foundation**, or worse, **the Initiative**.
 
You could be in **big trouble**.

Of course, learning more about **the past** of our proud society is **indicative** of **our current condition**.

The **hemovore reintegration** project that we offer

The exact nature of the **Stoa**.

The fall of the **Lodge of Paris**.

But there were many **deaths**, and even more **secrets**.

Of course, we **encourage** you to search for the **Truth** in **all its forms.**

**But you shouldn't be snooping around here, and you know it.**
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
